pkgmetadata.longdescription: # TkLineNums V.1.6.3TkLineNums is a simple line numbering widget for Tkinter. It supports ttk themes through the set_to_ttk_style method.![img](https://github.com/Moosems/TkLineNums/raw/main/images/TkLineNumsPhoto.png)## Features* Clicking on line numbers will set the insert to the beginning of the line.* Shift clicking will select all text from the end of the line clicked by cursor and the insert position.* Awful click-drag scrolling (Needs help)* Scrolling the linebar will scroll the text widget* Supports ttk themes* Supports left, right, and center alignment with the `justify` option
